scripts.server:deploy: cd dist/server && git add . && git commit -am 'deploy' && git push heroku master
scripts.client:deploy: cd dist/client && git init && heroku git:remote -a vindao && git add . && git commit -am 'deploy' && git push heroku master --force
scripts.dev:ssr: npm run server:dev & npm run client:ssr
scripts.dev:pwa: npm run server:dev & npm run client:pwa
scripts.dev:spa: npm run server:dev & npm run client:spa
scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.deploy: npm run server:deploy && npm run client:deploy
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy
